entities.name: TAX CUTS AND JOBS ACT
entities.description: The Tax Cuts and Jobs Act (TCJA) was enacted into law on December 22, 2017, significantly changing existing U.S. tax law and including numerous provisions affecting businesses.

entities.name: SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE COMMISSION
entities.description: The Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) issued Staff Accounting Bulletin No. 118, which guided the recording of additional tax expense in response to the enactment of the TCJA.

relationships.relationship_description: The enactment of the Tax Cuts and Jobs Act (TCJA) led to the recording of additional tax expense as guided by the Securities and Exchange Commission's Staff Accounting Bulletin No. 118.
